Text:
Why bother uploading a torrent and then suddenly decide NOT to seed it? What are we supposed to do, hmm? Randomly pluck data bits from thin air and piece them together?

I really dont get why ppl bother to upload if they wont push the torrent out. This has happened about 12 times today that I can think of, without seeders this is worthless.

Have a nice day.
My appologies for the outburst, it was a bit silly :D
